about_the_game:
Embark on the Ultimate Dragon Adventure in Draconia
Draconia, the breathtaking open-world dragon MORPG powered by Unreal Engine 5, invites you to step into the scales of a mighty dragon and claim the skies or the land as your own. In a world filled with mysteries and challenges, it's up to you to unravel the epic tale of Draconia, whether you choose to soar solo or collaborate with fellow dragons in single-player and multiplayer modes.

Unleash Your Inner Dragon
Choose your path from a diverse selection of dragon species, each with its unique traits and abilities. Customize your dragon's name, pattern, colors, and even body parts like horns and tail tips. Alternatively, pick from a range of pre-made textures to create the dragon of your dreams.

Survival of the Fittest
In the wilds of Draconia, the circle of life reigns supreme. Hunt for sustenance and locate vital water sources to survive in this unforgiving realm. Harness the scent system to track down nearby water and food, mastering the art of survival as you roam.

Collect, Craft, Conquer
Amass a hoard of valuable resources through the gathering and inventory system. Utilize your treasure trove to craft powerful objects, enhancing your dragon's capabilities or granting temporary buffs. Level up your character by completing tasks and quests, forging a dragon of unparalleled strength.

Forge Your Legacy
Immerse yourself in a world brimming with quests, secret locations, and a multitude of memorable characters. Unearth the enigmatic story of Draconia, piecing together its mysteries as you forge your own legend.

Your World, Your Rules
Draconia respects your playstyle. Opt for optional PvP, enabling or disabling it at will in your character profile. Safely explore servers without the fear of unwanted confrontation, and engage in thrilling battles only when you choose.

Make Your Mark
Personalize your dragon den into a reflection of your character and style, crafting a unique sanctuary that stands as a testament to your journey. But your adventure doesn't have to be a solitary one. Form or join groups and clans, inviting friends and like-minded players to accompany you on your epic journey. With your own clan, you can announce events, coordinate strategies, and keep tabs on the progress of your fellow members as you ascend the ranks of Draconia's dragon elite.

Prepare to Conquer Draconia
Draconia awaits, a world ripe for exploration, adventure, and conquest. Will you be the dragon that shapes its destiny? The sky is the limit and Draconia is yours to conquer. Claim your wings and rise above the rest in Draconia!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes fantasy violence.
Players are killing other fantasy creatures and will find carcasses in a realistic style.
